did.unittitle: David Von Drehle Notes on Triangle Fire Court Transcript
did.abstract: Notes of David Von Drehle on the December 1911 manslaughter trial of Isaac Harris and Max Blanck, owners of the Triangle Waist Company.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of David Von Drehle's notes on the December 1911 manslaughter trial of Isaac Harris and Max Blanck, owners of the Triangle Waist Company. The notes were taken from a partial transcript of the trial held by the New York County Lawyers Association.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: David Von Drehle Notes on Triangle Fire Court Transcript #6179m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
